title: League lags out and crashes
body: My friend and me played during the morning and noon and we were fine, we played later in the evening but the 2 games we played we lagged out during the mid game, we suspect its something in the LA area, San Gabriel, to be exact, someone on the enemy team looked like they disconnected too. It was only my friend, teemo, and me that disconnected. It also looked like it lasted the same duration but that teemo's dc lasted longer.

replies.body: When mine crashed, I can't log in as well.

me too- actually 3 games continually as hell- and I am banned for leaving- leave buster that so ridiculous and stupid- ban for no reason- why they created player behaviour but they didn't collect potential and serious contribute to analyze why this problems are still happening
LoL NA and OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.
There were some service issues going on last night on NA that have since been resolved. If you're still experiencing issues staying connected or encountering high latency, please let me know.

yeah! it is a right post to bump up my arguments- this morning I played a normal game- just a few minutes after selecting champion finished- then loading waiting for a screen- suddenly- the screen totally black and the board " Unfortunately you're disconnected from server" - LOL I can still suffer from several web pages and open Dota 2 to play- when reconnecting I couldn't control my mouse point- because of frozen cursors- then I decided to reconnect again- This is still the same problem- the game getting crash quickly as every minute- I tried to create many topics like this to warning them- but they feel ignoring community contribution until now- I am banned to wait for 5 queue in low priority due to it- That fine for me- from now I completely remove LOL and try to play new game-{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
LoL NA & OCE are currently experiencing technical difficulties. Riot is aware and working to resolve them. Apologies for the inconvenience.

DID it to me in the middle of a rank game my whole bot lane kept dcing and reconnecting so we werent able to remake becasue they kept trying to reconnect so the game was 3 v 5 the whole game, with 0 bot lane and because of the riot server thing i can't even do a reportable offense so i lose LP because riot servers decide to crap out i understand its a huge game but jesus man 800 + ping for the past week on and off i thought it was my internet but i guess not it was just riots servers. I hope i don't lose LP for this because if i get demote for this crap kinda Bull Sharky but whateves riot please do something in return of this becasue im sure alot of people lost game becasue of this so like a rank up or free two wins or something because this just ruined alot of things for people please do something to make up for this thankyou :D

Riot fix ur shitt !!!  I want to play 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
